data.title: Imgur, please help me find my brother
data.description: I'm searching for my biological brother.  I've tried all of the adoption registries, and I've had no luck.  I hope you guys will be supportive and help me!

images.title: My brother
images.description:
This is my brother. He is 9 in this picture, but he is 27 now. His birth name was Joshua Justin Elijah, although it is likely that his name is different now.  He was born in Mamou, Louisiana on 3/3/1987.  His adoptive parents were named Harriet and Steve.

Edit: Elijah is NOT his last name. Our birth mother gave us more names than we needed.  I opted to leave his surname off of his post.

images.title: Our birth mother
images.description:
This is Katherine, our birth mother.  Some know her by her middle name, Leyla.  She had three children, Dylan, Joshua, and me.  

She gave Joshua and I up for adoption to give us a better life she wasn't able to provide.

images.title: Our brother
images.description:
This is our brother Dylan.  He wasn't as lucky as Joshua and me.

He grew up with his grandparents and our birth mother was in and out of his life.  He had a really difficult life.  He and our birth mother had been estranged since 2006.

He took his life on 3/10/14.  Katie (birth mom) found me through a search angel in April, right before my 26 birthday.  We emailed back and forth, and she told me about all of her children.  When she told me Dylan's full name, I immediately googled him.  The first thing I found was his obituary.  I was one month too late.  My heart is broken that I'll never know him.  I'm hoping you guys will help me find Joshua so I don't miss out on his life.

images.title: This is me
images.description:
Sorry for the selfie.  If Joshua sees this, I wanted him to know who I am.  I was born on 4/6/1988 in Mamou, Louisiana.

 I'm begging you guys, to please help me find him.  Please be delicate, though.  He is an adult now, but I don't know if he knows he is adopted or if he wishes to know his birth family.

I really appreciate you guys in usersub that have read this whole thing!  If any of you have questions about adoption and the reunion process, I'd be happy to share the full story with you.  Just send me a message.  Love you guys <3
